summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of East 55th Street, from 15th Avenue Northeast to University Boulevard, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks on the north side thereof, with the necessary wooden cross walks, providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5050, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
